title: Dishes
description: Hand wash and dry the dirty dishes in the sink

title: Laundry
description: Sort the dirty laundry from the hamper. Wash and dry the laundry using the machines provided. Hang up or fold clean laundry and put it away

title: Mow the Lawn
description: Cut the grass using the provided lawn mower. Bag the clippings and put bags in the trash can

title: Grocery Shopping
description: Plan the meals for the week. Make a list of needed ingredients. Go to the grocery store and purchase the ingredients. Come home and put the items away in their respective proper places

title: Take a Nap
description: Fall asleep during the day in the living room. Wake up and look busy just before you're discovered

title: Eat Cheese
description: Choose from a lovely selection. Cut off a hunk and gobble it down.
